meta.description: Mathematical definitions and fault detection for curvature fields

curvature_field_generators.math: R(X, Y)Z = nabla_X nabla_Y Z - nabla_Y nabla_X Z - nabla_[X,Y] Z
curvature_field_generators.input_constraints: Piecewise constant sectional curvature on simplices.

higher_order_curvature_tensors.math: Covariant derivatives of Riemann Tensor: nabla R, nabla^2 R

singularity_check.logic: If Sectional_Curvature > K_max or < K_min, flag as 'Singularity Risk'.

bianchi_identity_violation.math: Sum(nabla R) should be 0 (Second Bianchi Identity).

curvature_flow.stabilization: DeTurck Normalization to prevent diffeomorphism instability.
